Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires mobile applications on cell phones, smart phones, and tablets that offer a subscription service provide an option to cancel the subscription on its application
Summary: Requires mobile applications on cell phones, smart phones and tablets that offer a subscription service provide an option to cancel the subscription on its application and have the option posted in a clear and conspicuous format.
LawCode: Add ยง527-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring mobile applications on electronic devices which provide a subscription service shall allow the cancellation of such service through its application
